summary: Completed testing of new pages (Industries, How It Works, Pricing, Contact) and AI Chat feature. All features working correctly. Fixed API endpoint mismatch (/api/inquiry) and removed About link from footer.
critical_code_review_comments: All new pages (Industries, How It Works, Pricing, Contact) implemented correctly with proper data-testid attributes
AI Chat widget using Emergent LLM Key with gpt-4o-mini model - working correctly
Price calculator on Pricing page correctly calculates volume discounts (0-25%)
Contact form and wholesale quote form both submit to /api/inquiry endpoint
Navigation updated: About removed, Wholesale added
Footer updated: About Us link removed, new page links added, email domain corrected to .in
updated_files: /app/frontend/src/components/Footer.js - Removed About Us link, added new page links, fixed email domain
/app/tests/test_new_pages_and_chat.py - New test file for pages and AI chat

success_rate.frontend: 100% (All pages loading, forms working, AI chat functional)

test_credentials.note: No login required for public pages

seed_data_creation: No seed data created - tested public endpoints

features: Displays 6 industry sectors: Commercial, Residential, Automotive, Retail, Healthcare, Hospitality
Each sector has image, description, and applications list
Stats section shows: 500+ Projects, 15+ Years, 200+ Clients, 50+ Cities
Shows 8-step process from selection to installation
Benefits bar: Quick Turnaround, Quality Assured, Best Prices, 24/7 Support
Contact CTA with phone and email
Volume discount tiers: Standard (0%), Bronze (10%), Silver (15%), Gold (20%), Platinum (25%)
Price calculator with glass type, thickness, and sqft inputs
Real-time price calculation with discount applied
Quote request modal with form submission to /api/inquiry
Quick contact: Call and WhatsApp buttons
Quick questions: glass types, delivery, custom sizes, bulk pricing
Receives AI responses from gpt-4o-mini via Emergent LLM Key
Accepts wholesale quote submissions with calculator_data
All nav items visible: Home, Products, Customize & Book, Industries, How It Works, Wholesale, Contact
New links added: Industries, How It Works, Wholesale Pricing

context_for_next_testing_agent: New pages and AI chat feature fully tested. Industries (6 sectors), How It Works (8 steps), Pricing (calculator with volume discounts), Contact (form + business details) all working. AI Chat uses Emergent LLM Key with gpt-4o-mini.
